rules_text:
Nourish 2 [i](When this creature enters, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two colorless Food artifact tokens with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Crab, Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, Serpent, and Shark you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
New card — Replaced Everhungry Specter

I don’t mind specter, but I think this is a more interesting big Nourish effect for a black uncommon, and also has more direct synergies with black’s archetypes
